plot: Senator Algore has been trying to tell this story for years, but no one has been listening. Years ago, Penguins were brought to zoos all across America. Somehow, word got back to Antarctica...
title: An Inconvenient Penguin
plot_es: Senator Algore has been trying to tell this story for years, but no one has been listening. Years ago, Penguins were brought to zoos all across America. Somehow, word got back to Antarctica...
plot_en: Senator Algore has been trying to tell this story for years, but no one has been listening. Years ago, Penguins were brought to zoos all across America. Somehow, word got back to Antarctica...
